words.phrase: And the king of Egypt spoke
words.source: H559 Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'And the king…spake', ESV 'Then the king…said', NASB 'Then the king…said' — all agree
H4428 noun masc sg cstr; KJV/ESV/NASB all 'king of'
H3205 prep+article + Piel participle fem pl abs 'to the midwives'; KJV/ESV/NASB all 'to the…midwives'
H5680 article + gentillic noun fem pl abs; KJV 'Hebrew midwives', ESV 'Hebrew midwives', NASB 'Hebrew midwives' — all agree
H834 relative particle; KJV 'of which', ESV '(one…the other)', NASB '(one…the other)' — introduces identification
H8034 noun masc sg cstr; KJV 'the name of', ESV 'was named', NASB 'the name of' — KJV/NASB agree
H259 article + adjective fem sg abs; KJV 'the one', ESV 'one', NASB 'one' — all agree
H8034 conj + noun masc sg cstr; KJV 'and the name of the other', ESV 'and the other', NASB 'and the other' — all convey the second name
H8145 article + ordinal adj fem sg abs; KJV 'the other', ESV 'the other', NASB 'the other' — all agree
